ITEM.TEXT: S.I.N.'s Secret Base from Street Fighter IV
STREET FIGHTER™ X TEKKEN™ Event Space
Cutthroats: Battle for Black Powder Cove

DESCRIPTION.BODY: Diagon Alley is a cobbled, crooked street, hidden in London, where many witches and wizards gather to do their shopping.
The Hogwarts Express is a scarlet steam engine that takes students to and from school.
The Great Hall is one of the largest rooms in Hogwarts castle, the main gathering place for meals and school events.
The Hogwarts library holds hundreds of narrow rows full of books on magic.
All first-years at Hogwarts must take seven subjects: Transfiguration, Charms, Potions, History of Magic, Defence Against the Dark Arts, Astronomy and Herbology.

The Forbidden Forest is on the edge of the Hogwarts grounds, near Hagrid's hut. The forest, full of magical, mysterious and dangerous creatures, is out of bounds to any student unaccompanied by Hogwarts staff.
This Moment from Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone on Pottermore.com depicts the life-size chess pieces that Professor McGonagall transfigures in the underground chambers of the school.
Link your PSN ID to your Pottermore.com account to access additional content and spaces. You can sign up for a free account at Pottermore.com.
Visit your house common room, once you have linked your Pottermore.com account.

ITEM.TEXT: S.I.N.'s Secret Base from Street Fighter IV
STREET FIGHTER™ X TEKKEN™ Event Space
Hot Shots Golf : Out of Bounds

ITEM.TEXT: Cutthroats: Battle for Black Powder Cove

DESCRIPTION.BODY:
Final Challenge from Money God Family ～then off to PlayStation®4～
All members will appear! This time Money God Family will not just run away!
During the event, Money God Family will appear from time to time dropping coins in Granzella's public lounges.
Pick up the coins and earn as many points as you can to receive special rewards and aim for the top of the rank!
Not to mention - top 3 players will receive extravagant prizes such as the PlayStation®4 console and game software!

※Money God Family will need to take a rest, so they will not appear from 02:00～09:00 Japan time.
Check them out and find your favorite!\nAvailable now!

☆Introducing New Items of the Week☆

You can find the latest released item right here!
Check them out and find your favorite!
